parameters.query: select cs.service_name,cs.service_description,c.company_name from companies c, company_services cs where c.company_id=cs.company_id and c.company_id=$1

INSERT INTO business_processes_states (business_process_id, company_id,n8n_workflow_execution_id,n8n_workflow_root_execution_id, started)
SELECT MAX(business_process_id), $2,$3,$4, NOW()
FROM public.business_processes
WHERE n8n_process_name = $1;
update business_processes_states set steps_total=$3 where business_process_id=(select MAX(business_process_id) from business_processes where n8n_process_name=$1) and n8n_workflow_execution_id=$2
update business_processes_states set steps_passed=$2, tokens_used=$3,tokens_used_type=$4 where n8n_workflow_execution_id=$1

nodes.name: Get current step and tokens saved

parameters.query: update business_processes_states set finished=NOW() where business_process_id=(select MAX(business_process_id) from business_processes where n8n_process_name=$1) and n8n_workflow_execution_id=$2

main.node: Get current step and tokens saved
